subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a mouse or rat. In the seal script form, which is inherited in the regular script, the upper component resembling {{l|zh|臼}} represents the open mouth of a rat with teeth displayed, and the lower component represents the two feet of a rat on the left and a tail on the right.

subSections.title: Etymology
